Preoperative nutritional state important factor determine surgical postoperative complication preoperative nutritional status affect postoperative nutritional state , immunity inflammatory response . In patient , standard parenteral nutrition may sufficient maintain immunity provide positive stabilized nitrogen balance . Preoperative perioperative supplementation immune-enhancing enteral nutrition report increase total lymphocytes T lymphocytes decrease circulating level interleukin 6 tumor necrosis factor- alfa . DOC.brief_title: Nutrition Colorectal Cancer Patients Neutrophil Functions
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose Hypercatabolism immune suppression frequently see patient malignancy.Preoperative nutritional state important factor determine surgical postoperative complication preoperative nutritional status affect postoperative nutritional state , immunity inflammatory response.In patient , standard parenteral nutrition may sufficient maintain immunity provide positive stabilized nitrogen balance . Preoperative perioperative supplementation immune-enhancing enteral nutrition report increase total lymphocytes T lymphocytes decrease circulating level interleukin 6 tumor necrosis factor- alfa.There report show glutamine dipeptide supplement parenteral nutrition improve cellular humoral immune function . The investigator aim evaluate effect postoperative glutamine-dipeptide and/or omega 3 fatty acid supplemented parenteral nutrition neutrophil function postoperative course patient colorectal cancer . Condition Intervention Phase Malnutrition Colorectal Cancer Dietary Supplement : Immunonutrition Phase 4 Study Type : Interventional Study Design : Prevention , Parallel Assignment , Double Blind ( Subject , Investigator ) , Randomized , N/A Official Title : Effects Of Standard And/Or Glutamine Dipeptide And/Or Omega-3 Fatty Ascid-Supplemented Parenteral Nutrition On Neutrophil Functions , Interleukin-8 Level And Length Of Stay-A Double Blind , Controlled , Randomized Study Primary Outcome Measure : Title : neutrophil function Time Frame : perioperative , postoperative third seventh day change first seven day hospital stay Description : For comparison four different nutrition neutrophil function first seven day hospital stay . Secondary Outcome Measures : Title : Length stay Time Frame : Length stay ( participant follow duration hospital stay ) colorectal cancer patient eligable study study january 2007 january 2008 one year period . Description : For comparison four different nutrition length stay ( participant follow duration hospital stay ) Actual Enrollment : 36 Study Start Date : January 2007 Actual Study Completion Date : January 2008 Actual Primary Completion Date : January 2008 Arms Assigned Interventions Active Comparator : Control isocaloric iso-nitrogenous standard parenteral nutrition Dietary Supplement : Immunonutrition Parenteral nutrition provide 25-30 kcal/kg/day energy 0.15-0.20 g/kg/day nitrogen . The dose omega 3 fatty acid supplementation 0.1-0.2 g/kg /day 0.3-0.4 g/kg/day glutamine dipeptide supplementation . All nutrient substrate mix 3 litre bag infuse 24 h dedicated central venous line Experimental : Standard parenteral-glutamine ( S-D ) alanine-glutamine ( aln-gln ) ( Dipeptiven ) supplement parenteral nutrition ( S-D group , n=8 ) , Dietary Supplement : Immunonutrition Parenteral nutrition provide 25-30 kcal/kg/day energy 0.15-0.20 g/kg/day nitrogen . The dose omega 3 fatty acid supplementation 0.1-0.2 g/kg /day 0.3-0.4 g/kg/day glutamine dipeptide supplementation . All nutrient substrate mix 3 litre bag infuse 24 h dedicated central venous line Experimental : Standard-Omega-3 fatty acid ( S-O ) Omega-3 fatty acid ( Omegaven ) supplement parenteral nutrition ( S-O group , n=8 ) Dietary Supplement : Immunonutrition Parenteral nutrition provide 25-30 kcal/kg/day energy 0.15-0.20 g/kg/day nitrogen . The dose omega 3 fatty acid supplementation 0.1-0.2 g/kg /day 0.3-0.4 g/kg/day glutamine dipeptide supplementation . All nutrient substrate mix 3 litre bag infuse 24 h dedicated central venous line Experimental : Standard-glutamine-omega 3 ( S-D-O ) ala-gln omega 3 fatty ascid supplemented parenteral nutrition ( S-D-O group , n=10 ) . Dietary Supplement : Immunonutrition Parenteral nutrition provide 25-30 kcal/kg/day energy 0.15-0.20 g/kg/day nitrogen . The dose omega 3 fatty acid supplementation 0.1-0.2 g/kg /day 0.3-0.4 g/kg/day glutamine dipeptide supplementation . All nutrient substrate mix 3 litre bag infuse 24 h dedicated central venous line
DOC.criteria: Colorectal cancer patient include study 50 70 year old preoperatively suffer serious comorbid chronic disease receive chemotherapy radiotherapy immunosuppressive /or immunomodulator drug last 6 month
